item.title: Apps, and their impact on the smart phone
item.author: Kamil
item.description: When we buy a new phone, manufacturers advertise it always as a super fast with superb colours and a long lasting battery. Usually it’s true, which we can confirm just after the unboxing ritual when we hold our brand new device in the hands. It’s shiny, without scratches, with a specific smell, plus it’s really fast and battery lasts very long. Until… we actually start using the phone, by this I mean installing the whole lot of our favourite apps.
